text: int main ( void ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { int n , i ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; if ( n == 1 ) printf ( "1\n" ) ; else { int a [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; int b [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) b [ i ] = 1 ; for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] >= a [ i - 1 ] ) b [ i ] = b [ i - 1 ] + 1 ; else b [ i ] = 1 ; } int sum = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) sum += b [ i ] ; printf ( "%d\n" , sum ) ; } } return 0 ; }
